00030 #include "regenc.h"
00031 
00032 #define ENC_IS_ISO_8859_11_CTYPE(code,ctype) \
00033   ((EncISO_8859_11_CtypeTable[code] & CTYPE_TO_BIT(ctype)) != 0)
00034

00069 
00070 static int
00071 is_code_ctype(OnigCodePoint code, unsigned int ctype, OnigEncoding enc ARG_UNUSED)
00072 {
00073   if (code < 256)
00074     return ENC_IS_ISO_8859_11_CTYPE(code, ctype);
00075   else
00076     return FALSE;
00077 }
00078 
00079 OnigEncodingDefine(iso_8859_11, ISO_8859_11) = {
00080   onigenc_single_byte_mbc_enc_len,
00081   "ISO-8859-11",  /* name */
00082   1,             /* max enc length */
00083   1,             /* min enc length */
00084   onigenc_is_mbc_newline_0x0a,
00085   onigenc_single_byte_mbc_to_code,
00086   onigenc_single_byte_code_to_mbclen,
00087   onigenc_single_byte_code_to_mbc,
00088   onigenc_ascii_mbc_case_fold,
00089   onigenc_ascii_apply_all_case_fold,
00090   onigenc_ascii_get_case_fold_codes_by_str,
00091   onigenc_minimum_property_name_to_ctype,
00092   is_code_ctype,
00093   onigenc_not_support_get_ctype_code_range,
00094   onigenc_single_byte_left_adjust_char_head,
00095   onigenc_always_true_is_allowed_reverse_match
00096 };
00097 ENC_ALIAS("ISO8859-11", "ISO-8859-11")
00098 
00099 /*
00100  * Name: TIS-620
00101  * MIBenum: 2259
00102  * Link: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thai_Industrial_Standard_620-2533
00103  */
00104 ENC_REPLICATE("TIS-620", "ISO-8859-11")
00105 
00106 /*
00107  * Name: Windows-874
00108  * Link: http://www.microsoft.com/globaldev/reference/sbcs/874.mspx
00109  */
00110 ENC_REPLICATE("Windows-874", "ISO-8859-11")
00111 ENC_ALIAS("CP874", "Windows-874")
